answerText: "The Death of the Ball Turret Gunner"[10] Randall Jarrell, the author of "The Death of the Ball Turret Gunner," was a good friend of this poet of Lord Weary's Castle and For the Union Dead.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Penn | 11 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The narrator of this poem "fell into the State" and "hunched in its belly till [his] wet fur froze." For 10 points each: [10] Name this poem in which the narrator awakens to "nightmare fighters" and is "washed... out... with a hose."
